description:
Get to know Ayame, Ran, and Tsubaki by completing puzzles and discovering their stories.

AMAZING ART

The art style of Hentai Stars brings you into the world of anime. Explore every story by solving puzzles and watch how the beautiful girls change. And don't worry, they will accompany you through the entire game. 

INCREASING DIFFICULTY

With the gameplay mechanics, after each puzzle is completed, the difficulty will increase. Try to solve all of them and don't get too distracted by girlsâ€™ outfits, which will change every time.


Key Features:
- Hand-drawn Hentai art
- Sensual music track
- Simple gameplay mechanics
- Different difficulty levels
- Unique outfits and locations
name: Hentai Stars
